languages.text: {n}Арбитр поднимает на вас глаза.{/n} "Я к тебе привязался, и я об этом сожалею. И о том, что говорю все это — тоже сожалею. Когда ты умрешь, мне будет очень скверно, и я думаю об этом миге, жду его и боюсь. И мне стыдно за эту слабость".

{n}Solomorne raises his eyes to you.{/n} "I have become attached to you, and I regret it. And I regret saying all this too. When you die, it will be very bad for me, and I think of that moment, I wait for it and dread it. And I am ashamed of this weakness."
languages.original_text: {n}Арбитр поднимает на вас глаза.{/n} "Я к тебе привязался, и я об этом сожалею. И о том, что говорю все это — тоже сожалею. Когда ты умрешь, мне будет очень скверно, и я думаю об этом миге, жду его и боюсь. И мне стыдно за эту слабость".

{n}Solomorne raises his eyes to you.{/n} "I have become attached to you, and I regret it. And I regret saying all this too. When you die, it will be very bad for me, and I think of that moment, I wait for it and dread it. And I am ashamed of this weakness."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne lève les yeux vers vous.{/n} « Je me suis attaché à vous et je le regrette, autant que ce que je viens de vous révéler. Votre mort me sera très difficile à vivre ; je ne peux pas m'empêcher de penser à ce moment, je le crois inévitable et le redoute. Et j'ai honte de cette faiblesse. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne raises his eyes to you.{/n} "I have become attached to you, and I regret it. And I regret saying all this too. When you die, it will be very bad for me, and I think of that moment, I wait for it and dread it. And I am ashamed of this weakness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne lève les yeux vers vous.{/n} « Je me suis attaché à vous et je le regrette, autant que ce que je viens de vous révéler. Votre mort me sera très difficile à vivre ; je ne peux pas m'empêcher de penser à ce moment, je le crois inévitable et le redoute. Et j'ai honte de cette faiblesse. »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは視線を上げて、あなたを見つめた。{/n}「私は…あなたに情を抱いてしまいました。そのことを後悔しています。このようなことを口にしたことも。あなたが死ぬとき…その瞬間は、私にとってとても耐え難いものになるでしょう。その時のことを考えずにはいられません。その時を待ち構える一方で、恐れてもいる。そして…このような弱さを恥じています」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne raises his eyes to you.{/n} "I have become attached to you, and I regret it. And I regret saying all this too. When you die, it will be very bad for me, and I think of that moment, I wait for it and dread it. And I am ashamed of this weakness."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは視線を上げて、あなたを見つめた。{/n}「私は…あなたに情を抱いてしまいました。そのことを後悔しています。このようなことを口にしたことも。あなたが死ぬとき…その瞬間は、私にとってとても耐え難いものになるでしょう。その時のことを考えずにはいられません。その時を待ち構える一方で、恐れてもいる。そして…このような弱さを恥じています」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne levanta la vista hacia ti.{/n} «Siento apego por usted y lo lamento. Al igual que lamento haber dicho todo esto. Cuando muera, será un momento terrible para mí, y no paro de pensar en ese momento y temer su llegada. Y me avergüenza esta debilidad».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne raises his eyes to you.{/n} "I have become attached to you, and I regret it. And I regret saying all this too. When you die, it will be very bad for me, and I think of that moment, I wait for it and dread it. And I am ashamed of this weakness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne levanta la vista hacia ti.{/n} «Siento apego por usted y lo lamento. Al igual que lamento haber dicho todo esto. Cuando muera, será un momento terrible para mí, y no paro de pensar en ese momento y temer su llegada. Y me avergüenza esta debilidad».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙抬起头，看着你。{/n}“我已经开始依恋你了，我很后悔，也很后悔对你坦白了这一切。如果你不幸身死，那我绝对接受不了这样的噩耗。每当我想到这个可能性，我就像是在等待它的到来，这让我恐惧不已。我为这个弱点感到羞愧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne raises his eyes to you.{/n} "I have become attached to you, and I regret it. And I regret saying all this too. When you die, it will be very bad for me, and I think of that moment, I wait for it and dread it. And I am ashamed of this weakness."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙抬起头，看着你。{/n}“我已经开始依恋你了，我很后悔，也很后悔对你坦白了这一切。如果你不幸身死，那我绝对接受不了这样的噩耗。每当我想到这个可能性，我就像是在等待它的到来，这让我恐惧不已。我为这个弱点感到羞愧。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un gözleri seninkilerle buluşuyor.{/n} "Sana çok bağlandım ve buna, tüm bu anlattıklarıma pişmanım. Öldüğünde canım o kadar yanacak ki. O anı düşünmeden edemiyorum, elim kolum bağlı beklemekten başka çarem yok ve ödüm kopuyor. Zayıflığımdan utanıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne raises his eyes to you.{/n} "I have become attached to you, and I regret it. And I regret saying all this too. When you die, it will be very bad for me, and I think of that moment, I wait for it and dread it. And I am ashamed of this weakness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne'un gözleri seninkilerle buluşuyor.{/n} "Sana çok bağlandım ve buna, tüm bu anlattıklarıma pişmanım. Öldüğünde canım o kadar yanacak ki. O anı düşünmeden edemiyorum, elim kolum bağlı beklemekten başka çarem yok ve ödüm kopuyor. Zayıflığımdan utanıyorum."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne sieht zu dir auf.{/n} "Ich habe mich in Euch verliebt und bereue es.. Und ich bereue, dass ich Euch das alles sage. Wenn Ihr sterbt, werde ich leiden. Ich denke die ganze Zeit an diesen Moment und fürchte ihn. Und ich schäme mich für diese Schwäche."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne raises his eyes to you.{/n} "I have become attached to you, and I regret it. And I regret saying all this too. When you die, it will be very bad for me, and I think of that moment, I wait for it and dread it. And I am ashamed of this weakness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne sieht zu dir auf.{/n} "Ich habe mich in Euch verliebt und bereue es.. Und ich bereue, dass ich Euch das alles sage. Wenn Ihr sterbt, werde ich leiden. Ich denke die ganze Zeit an diesen Moment und fürchte ihn. Und ich schäme mich für diese Schwäche."
